import React from 'react' import { AboutColumn, AboutRow, Img, ImgWrapper } from '../AboutSection/AboutElements' import { Form } from '../Footer/FooterElements' import { NewsletterBox, NewsletterContainer, NewsletterSec, NewsletterText, NewsletterWrapper, SearchBar, TextWrapper, TitleWrapper, EmailButton} from './NewsletterElements' import img from '.../../../public/blogs.svg' import { Title } from '../../globalStyles' import newsletter from '.../../../public/Newsletter.svg' function Newsletter() { return ( Get all the latest news and articles Subscribe to our Coursenator NewsLetter for the latest updates on Online Education news and articles
Sign up for free
) } export default Newsletter
